Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam in the bottom of the 5th inning
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Stephen Vogt believed the Guardians would be boarding a flight to New York later that day
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt said, 'You have to believe. If you don’t believe in your group, don’t even show up. We knew, as soon as we got back to Cleveland (after Thursday’s 5-4 win) we had a chance.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 10th winner-take-all game in franchise history and their first victory in such a game since beating the Yankees in Game 5 of the 1997 ALDS
Others: The Guardians won by using eight pitchers, they needed a grand slam by Lane Thomas, another three-hit game by Steven Kwan and a two-inning save by Emmanuel Clase
